awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Twenty years after his triumphs as a freshman on the football field, Harold is a mild-mannered clerk who dreams about marrying the girl at the desk down the aisle. But losing his job destroys that dream, and when he finds a particularly potent drink at his local bar, he goes on a very strange and funny rampage (with a lion in tow).

title: The Sin of Harold Diddlebock
